text: The Buick Century is a car made from the 1936–1942, 1954–1958 and 1973–2005 model years. It is a full-size car from 1936–1942 and 1954–1958 and a mid-size car from 1973–2005. In 2005, it was succeeded by the Buick LaCrosse. == Generations == === 1936–1942 === Buick Century 4-Dorrars Sedan 1937.jpg === 1954–1958 === Buick Century 4-Dorrars Sedan 1956.jpg === 1973–1977 === 1973BuickCenturyGSlarge.JPG === 1978–1981 === '70s Buick Century.jpg === 1982–1996 === '83 Buick Century Sedan.JPG === 1997–2005 === 97-05 Buick Century .jpg Category:1930s automobiles Category:1940s automobiles Category:1950s automobiles Category:1970s automobiles Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Century Category:Coupes Category:Sedans
title: Buick Century
